00011 #ifndef PBRT_LIGHT_H
00012 #define PBRT_LIGHT_H
00013 // light.h*
00014 #include "pbrt.h"
00015 #include "geometry.h"
00016 #include "transform.h"
00017 #include "color.h"
00018 #include "paramset.h"
00019 #include "mc.h"
00020 // Light Declarations
00021 class COREDLL Light {
00022 public:
00023         // Light Interface
00024         virtual ~Light();
00025         Light(const Transform &l2w, int ns = 1)
00026                 : nSamples(max(1, ns)), LightToWorld(l2w),
00027                   WorldToLight(l2w.GetInverse()) {
00028                 if (WorldToLight.HasScale())
00029                         Warning("Scaling detected in world-to-light transformation!\n"
00030                                 "The system has numerous assumptions, implicit and explicit,\n"
00031                                 "that this transform will have no scale factors in it.\n"
00032                                 "Proceed at your own risk; your image may have errors or\n"
00033                                 "the system may crash as a result of this.");
00034         }
00035         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p,
00036                 Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *vis) const = 0;
00037         virtual Spectrum Power(const Scene *) const = 0;
00038         virtual bool IsDeltaLight() const = 0;
00039         virtual Spectrum Le(const RayDifferential &r) const;
00040         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, float u1,
00041                 float u2, Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00042                 VisibilityTester *vis) const = 0;
00043         virtual float Pdf(const Point &p,
00044                           const Vector &wi) const = 0;
00045         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, const Normal &n,
00046                         float u1, float u2, Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00047                         VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00048                 return Sample_L(p, u1, u2, wi, pdf, visibility);
00049         }
00050         virtual float Pdf(const Point &p, const Normal &n,
00051                         const Vector &wi) const {
00052                 return Pdf(p, wi);
00053         }
00054         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1,
00055                 float u2, float u3, float u4,
00056                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const = 0;
00057         // Light Public Data
00058         const int nSamples;
00059 protected:
00060         // Light Protected Data
00061         const Transform LightToWorld, WorldToLight;
00062 };
00063 struct COREDLL VisibilityTester {
00064         // VisibilityTester Public Methods
00065         void SetSegment(const Point &p1, const Point &p2) {
00066                 r = Ray(p1, p2-p1, RAY_EPSILON, 1.f - RAY_EPSILON);
00067         }
00068         void SetRay(const Point &p, const Vector &w) {
00069                 r = Ray(p, w, RAY_EPSILON);
00070         }
00071         bool Unoccluded(const Scene *scene) const;
00072         Spectrum Transmittance(const Scene *scene) const;
00073         Ray r;
00074 };
00075 class AreaLight : public Light {
00076 public:
00077         // AreaLight Interface
00078         AreaLight(const Transform &light2world,
00079                 const Spectrum &power, int ns, const Reference<Shape> &shape);
00080         virtual Spectrum L(const Point &p, const Normal &n,
00081                         const Vector &w) const {
00082                 return Dot(n, w) > 0 ? Lemit : 0.;
00083         }
00084         Spectrum Power(const Scene *) const {
00085                 return Lemit * area * M_PI;
00086         }
00087         bool IsDeltaLight() const { return false; }
00088         float Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00089         float Pdf(const Point &, const Normal &, const Vector &) const;
00090         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, Vector *w, VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00091         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, const Normal &N,
00092                 float u1, float u2, Vector *wo, float *pdf,
00093                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00094         virtual Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2, Vector *wo,
00095                 float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00096         Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00097                         float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const;
00098 protected:
00099         // AreaLight Protected Data
00100         Spectrum Lemit;
00101         Reference<Shape> shape;
00102         float area;
00103 };
00104 #endif // PBRT_LIGHT_H
